VanDeal

The most rapidly growing WeChat channel in Vancouver. Over 6000 subscribers and counting!

About VanDeal


VanDeal is a WeChat channel. WeChat is the #1 social media platform in China. Over 900 million Chinese use it. VanDeal posts Vancouver’s local stores and big chain store’s discount information daily. Now “VanDeal” has over 6000 subscribers and growing. All subscribers are Chinese living in Vancouver.
We provide a win-win for both shops and Chinese in Vancouver. Chinese in Vancouver can shop more smartly and shops can get more revenue.

VanDeal Subscribers Profile



75% female
90% aged from 19 to 45

Why Choose Advertising on VanDeal?



Precision

Most of our subscribers are Chinese women in Vancouver. In Chinese culture, women are the decision-makers in the family. Your promotion messages will be delivered to 6000 decision-makers.

Influence

6000 subscribers. Every month over 51,000 reads (WeChat official statistics).

Purchase Ready

The intention of our subscribers is to spend money. They want to spend it in a smart way. They are purchase ready.

Deals feed AD

Your ads will be a deal to subscribers, which will increase the response rate significantly.

VanDeal Ads type and position

Banner Ads


Each banner will be inserted in between two deals. The reader will not miss it.


Learn more

Deal Feed Ads


We have two type of deal feed ads.

1. Whole article. This is suitable for a grocery store or stores that have a lot of information. It works like a flyer.
2. Inside of our daily deal feed. This is suitable for a simple promotion message. It works for most stores.


Learn more

Distribute your mobile coupons to VanDeal Subscribers


Best channel to reach Chinese women in Vancouver. It’s simple, effective and trackable.
